Hi, my name is

Saurabh Jangra.I build things for the web

A self-motivated and dedicated computer science engineering graduate with coding knowledge in different programming languages. Professional with advanced knowledge of designing and building web pages. A motivated and dedicated individual seeking a position that involves regular use of these skills.Learn More

01.About Me

Hello! My name is Saurabh Jangra and I enjoy creating things that live on internet. My interest in web development started during my graduation course when I designed a web page for our group project when I came to know about the vast ocean of designing web my interest made me to dive deep in the ocean of web.

Fast-forward to today, as I have worked on different projects which includes different technologies , I have enough knowledge about react and other technologies now I am looking for opportunities to work in corporate sector.

Results-driven, adaptable, Computer Science engineer with a highly analytical mindset, passion for innovation, and documented success in hands-on roles. Expert at working in collaboration with cross-functional teams in the development and execution of critical projects, including planning, budgets, and workflows. Dedicated to advancing my career into Web Development within a highly recognized, employee-centric company.

Here are few technologies I have been working with recently:

  • Javascript(ES6+)
  • Next.js
  • React
  • Node.js
  • Express.js
  • MongoDB
  • TailwindCSS
  • TypeScript

02.Where I have Worked

Intern

Jan 2022 - April 2022

  • Built and deployed an AI Enabled Fintech B2B Cloud Application
  • Involved in creating a full stack web-based product thereby developing a deep understanding of all aspects of product development such as identifying appropriate user requirements, designing a great user experience and building appropriate data models and machine learning models along with relevant UI components and backend design

03.Some Things I have Built

Featured Project

Tesla Clone

A Responsive real-like Tesla Clone created with ReactJs,React-router, Firebase for authentication, Redux for state management, AOS, Styled-components and Material-UI.

  • Responsive
  • React-router
  • Firebase
  • Styled-components

Featured Project

Online Art Gallery

An Online Art Gallery which inludes Authentication using JWT, state management using react useState, also used MongoDB as database and Tailwind CSS for styling entire application.

  • Authentication
  • React-useState
  • MongoDB
  • Tailwind CSS
  • Node.js

Featured Project

Form Page

A Login page created with ReactJs,Firebase, Firebase for authentication, Redux for state management, AOS, Styled-components and Material-UI.

  • Responsive
  • React-router
  • Firebase
  • Styled-components
